fields.name: Shuffle:
fields.value: Receive a random list of living players based on your score. Target half of them, rounded up (but no less than 2). If any of your target's attack another, the attack will be reversed (the target will attack the attacker with the attacker's attack power). If none of your targets attack another, you will instead reverse any negative effects (except for roleblocks).

fields.name: Uno Reverse Card (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Target any player. The first time they are attacked, the attack will be reversed. This effect continues even if you die.
